camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSNSClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSNSClient
camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSNSClient.description: To use the AmazonSNS as the client

camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSQSClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSQSClient
camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSQSClient.description: An SQS Client to use as bridge between SNS and SQS

camel.sink.endpoint.autoCreateTopic.name: camel.sink.endpoint.autoCreateTopic
camel.sink.endpoint.autoCreateTopic.description: Setting the autocreation of the topic

camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient
camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient.description: Setting the autoDiscoverClient mechanism, if true, the component will look for a client instance in the registry automatically otherwise it will skip that checking.

camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy.name: camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy
camel.sink.endpoint.headerFilterStrategy.description: To use a custom HeaderFilterStrategy to map headers to/from Camel.

camel.sink.endpoint.kmsMasterKeyId.name: camel.sink.endpoint.kmsMasterKeyId
camel.sink.endpoint.kmsMasterKeyId.description: The ID of an AWS-managed customer master key (CMK) for Amazon SNS or a custom CMK.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.messageStructure.name: camel.sink.endpoint.messageStructure
camel.sink.endpoint.messageStructure.description: The message structure to use such as json

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the SNS client

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the SNS client

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyProtocol.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyProtocol
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyProtocol.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the SNS client One of: [HTTP] [HTTPS]

camel.sink.endpoint.region.name: camel.sink.endpoint.region
camel.sink.endpoint.region.description: The region in which SNS client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

camel.sink.endpoint.serverSideEncryption.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serverSideEncryptionEnabled
camel.sink.endpoint.serverSideEncryption.description: Define if Server Side Encryption is enabled or not on the topic

camel.sink.endpoint.subject.name: camel.sink.endpoint.subject
camel.sink.endpoint.subject.description: The subject which is used if the message header 'CamelAwsSnsSubject' is not present.

camel.sink.endpoint.subscribeSNStoSQS.name: camel.sink.endpoint.subscribeSNStoSQS
camel.sink.endpoint.subscribeSNStoSQS.description: Define if the subscription between SNS Topic and SQS must be done or not

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.aws-sns.basicPropertyBin.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
